Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Service Delayed Cicero
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing Cicero due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Cicero due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/84th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 83rd, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 83rd, Vincennes, 87th and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/84th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays, Limited Service Between O'Hare and Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line service experiencing delays due to track conditions nr Irving Pk; limited service via train shuttle btwn O'Hare & Jefferson Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are experiencing delays to due track conditions near Irving Park.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Forest Park and Addison and,
  • between Jefferson Park and O'Hare, with limited service.

Bus shuttles are also available between Jefferson Park and Addison to help make connections. Board shuttle train at Jefferson Park for continuing service to/from O'Hare terminal.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Roosevelt and 63rd
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 63rd due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 63rd due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Roosevelt and,
  • between 63rd and 95th, only.

 Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 63rd to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #29 State bus route or Cermak-McCormick Place (Green Line)

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
